intro: Nekemias celebica, commonly known as the Celebes nekemias, is a flowering plant native to the Moluccas in Indonesia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and herbs. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale pink in color. Its leaves are usually opposite and have a glossy surface. Nekemias celebica is often found in moist, shaded environments within tropical forests.
